member_organisations:
https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org/get_involved/ 
 
from this link details of our member organisations
eu_initiatives:
Raising awareness with Merchants, Acquirers, vendors, Processors and other bodies, including regulators about the range of PCI standards and supporting documents and how these can help improve security and reduce fraud and data loss. 
 
Included within the guidance documents are specific guidance to small merchants.  
 
The PCI documents are available in 9 core languages 
 
The above is carried out through face to face meeting, conferences and via the internet
organisation_name: Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council (PCI SSC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
We provide, support and maintain a range of standards aimed at any and all entities that store, process or transmit  payment card information regardless of the method and technology used.  
 
The aim of these standards is to prevent cardholder data from being stolen and used fraudulently. 
 
In addition we also provide standards that assess the security of Point of Sale PIN Entry devices. 
 
Finally we approve and list Assessors and Evaluators that can be used by organisations to validate correct adoption and implementation of PCI Standards
relevant_communication: Events include, meetings, webinars, working groups and task forces covering a wide range of topics related to improving security for card based payments.
